descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Blazers get their first points of the night as Damian Lillard finds a cutting Robert Covington for the one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard finds a cutting Covington for the dunk) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard finds a cutting Covington for the dunk

videos.description: Facundo Campazzo finds a cutting Aaron Gordon who rises high for the jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aaron Gordon soars for the dunk off the Facundo Campazzo feed) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Aaron Gordon soars for the dunk off the Facundo Campazzo feed

videos.description: Nikola Jokic does his best Dirk Nowitzki impression as he drains the fadeaway off one foot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jokic channels Dirk with the one-legged fadeaway) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic channels Dirk with the one-legged fadeaway

videos.description: Carmelo Anthony nails the 3-pointer then smiles while taking in the Denver crowd booing him.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Melo relishes the Denver crowd boos after bottoming 3) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Melo relishes the Denver crowd boos after bottoming 3

videos.description: Damian Lillard gets rid of Facundo Campazzo, then steps behind the 3-point line and drains the shot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard discards Facundo Campazzo, buries 3) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard discards Facundo Campazzo, buries 3

videos.description: CJ McCollum is denied at the rim by Michael Porter Jr. sending the Nuggets in transition resulting in an Austin Rivers 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porter's block on McCollum leads to the Rivers 3) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porter's block on McCollum leads to the Rivers 3

videos.description: Jamal Murray has a priceless face after the Nuggets are called for a foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Murray becomes a meme after foul call) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Murray becomes a meme after foul call

videos.description: Jusuf Nurkic doesn't care that Aaron Gordon is standing under the rim as he rises over him and dunks it.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nurkic destroys the rim with the dunk on Gordon) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nurkic destroys the rim with the dunk on Gordon

videos.description: Damian Lillard comes off the screen and drains the long 3-pointer tying the score and forcing a Denver timeout.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dame brings Portland even with long 3) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dame brings Portland even with long 3

videos.description: Jamal Murray speaks to the Denver crowd before Game 1 and gets them fired up.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Misc. (Murray fires up crowd pregame) 2021/05/22 ESHEET 3PV

videos.headline: Murray fires up crowd pregame

videos.description: Michael Porter Jr. brings Denver within four as he get the layup to go.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porter brings crowd to its feet with this shot) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porter brings crowd to its feet with this shot

videos.description: Damian Lillard silences the Denver crowd as he hits a huge 3 to put Portland up 10.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard can't be stopped by Campazzo on this big 3) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard can't be stopped by Campazzo on this big 3

videos.description: Damian Lillard discusses Portland's Game 1 win and how he expects the Nuggets will guard him throughout this series.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Dame breaks down how he thinks he’ll be guarded in the series) 2021/05/22

videos.headline: Dame breaks down how he thinks he'll be guarded in the series

videos.description: Damian Lillard's impressive 34-point, 13-assist double-double gives the Trail Blazers more than enough juice to outlast the Nuggets 123-109 in Game 1.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Dame takes over to lift Blazers past Nuggets in Game 1) 2021/05/22 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Dame takes over to lift Blazers past Nuggets in Game 1
